resources.string: Service handling the ftDuinoBlue HM-10 bluetooth connection
Bluetooth Low Energy is not supported on this device! But you can still run the demos.
Searching for ftDuinoBlue devices. Please make sure your target device is powered on and the LED on its HM-10 module blinks slowly.

%s V%s
by Till Harbaum

Build custom remote user interfaces for ftDuino/Arduino.

More information:
http://ftduino.de/blue/
Source code:
https://github.com/harbaum/ftDuinoBlue
The following is the XML code of this demo setup as it would be stored on the ftDuino/Arduino.
